lead_paragraph: Florida Marlins Manager Fredi González signed a contract extension through 2011, which was announced shortly before the team’s first full-squad workout. The Marlins were 71-91 in his first season and 84-77 last year. González needs 86 wins to match Jack McKeon’s franchise record of 241.
